sourcesContent:
<!-- eslint-disable vue/multi-word-component-names -->
<template>
  <b-navbar toggleable="md" type="light" variant="light">
    <b-navbar-brand href="#" @click="setCurrentChallenge('')">VAST</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-toggle target="navbarNav"></b-navbar-toggle>
    <b-collapse id="navbarNav" is-nav>
      <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
        <b-nav-item :class="{'active': currentChallenge === 'Challenge2'}" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge2')">Challenge 2</b-nav-item>
        <b-nav-item :class="{'active': currentChallenge === 'Challenge3'}" @click="setCurrentChallenge('Challenge3')">Challenge 3</b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>
    </b-collapse>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Header',
  props: {
    currentChallenge: {
      type: String,
      default: '',
    },
  },
  methods: {
    setCurrentChallenge(challenge) {
      this.$emit('challenge-selected', challenge);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
nav {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.active {
  background-color: #337ab7;
  color: white;
}
</style>
